What Can Be Recycled:

PETE [1] (soda bottles, water bottles, food packaging), HDPE [2] (Milk jugs, cosmetics, shampoo), LDPE [4] (squeezable bottles, shopping bags, bread bags)


Difficult or Can't Be Recycled:

 PS [6] (egg cartons, meat trays, disposable plates, to-go containers), Other PP [7] (bottle caps, buckets, plastic furniture) , PVC [3] (cleaning products pipes, some toys)
